group_1.textRight: Mami...?

group_1.textLeft: That's what she said.@[chara:101001:lipSynch_0][freeze:1.5][chara:101001:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:101001:lipSynch_1]Hey, pass the sugar?

group_1.textRight: ...Mm, here.

group_1.textLeft: Thanks!

group_1.textRight: But a veteran Magical Girl like her not@knowing about Iroha's thing...
Y'know, the monster that came out@of her hair.
Maybe it really is that dangerous?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah? How do ya figure?@Ya think...
She's really experienced enough@to know all there is to know?

group_1.textRight: But, I mean...!@Kaede gets it, right?
Yeah... Yeah! For sure.@She was super strong!
Strong as Yachiyo, right?

group_1.textLeft: That strong?![chara:101001:lipSynch_0][freeze:0.7][chara:101001:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:101001:lipSynch_1] No way...@[chara:101001:lipSynch_0][freeze:1.2][chara:101001:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:101001:lipSynch_1]But I guess...
Tsuruno did say something similar before...

group_1.textRight: See?
She's something else... That powerful,@[chara101101:lipSynch_0][freeze:1.5][chara:101101:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara101101:lipSynch_1]and still such a kind, nice person...

group_1.textLeft: Oh okay, that's where I gotta stop @agreein' with ya. I don't think that at all.

group_1.textRight: Whaaaat? Why?
It's not like she knew anything about it.@You'd get the wrong idea too...
If you saw a big monster like that, you@wouldn't think twice about attacking it.

group_1.textLeft: Well... I guess maybe...@It's just the principle, ya know?
Just somethin'...@Kinda off... Cold, or patronizing...
I just didn't like it...

group_1.textRight: I don't blame her for that, though.@
She's way older than us.@That's just how it goes.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?@[chara:101001:lipSynch_0][freeze:0.5][chara:101001:motion_100][chara:101001:lipSynch_1]Is she that much older?

group_1.textRight: Yeah.@She's like Yachiyo's age, maybe.
Maybe.@That means you don't know her age?
Nope. I didn't ask.

group_1.textLeft: If you don't know, then why are@you actin' like it's so obvious?!

group_1.textRight: Because she's so great at@Magical Girl stuff...
And, well...

group_1.textLeft: Well?

group_1.textRight: Her boobs are like, really big.

group_1.textLeft: Whaaaat?@[chara:101001:lipSynch_0][freeze:0.5][chara:101001:motion_300][chara:101001:lipSynch_1]That's got nothing to do with...anything!

group_1.textRight: B-boo...bs...?@[chara:101101:lipSynch_0][freeze:1.5][chara:101101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock][chara:101101:lipSynch_1]That's so crude, Rena!

What's [chara:100901:lipSynch_0][freeze:0.7][chara:100901:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain][chara:100901:lipSynch_1]crude about it...?!@[chara:100901:lipSynch_0][freeze:1][chara:100901:motion_400][chara:100901:lipSynch_1]It's not...!
Hey, actually, Kaede!
How'd you get so bouncy? Special diet?@Maybe a magic elixir you drank?
Tell your organic food eating family@that I want in...
I know! Your family gave you mugwort @juice while you were growing up! Right?!
Uh...?@[chara:101101:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_031.exp.json:mouthOpen_1]I don't...know what...

group_1.textLeft: All right, everyone, reel it in...! Geeze,@look where this conversation ended up.

group_1.textRight: Y-yeah, that's what I was saying!
Huh?! And who do you think's the@one who knocked us off course...?!
Haugh...

group_1.textLeft: Time out everybody...
We've gotta focus, all right?@We gotta talk about...Mami Tomoe.
...The girl from out of town...@That mysterious veteran Magical Girl...

group_1.textRight: (...Miss Mami Tomoe...)

group_1.textLeft: (...Mami Tomoe...)
(I feel like it won't be that@long... [chara:101001:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json]Not long at all...)

group_1.textRight: (This is just the first...)
(...of many encounters we'll have with her.)
